title: Ep. #33 | K-Pop Holiday Classics: EXO, IU, and Eric Nam // Theme of the Week
description:
Welcome back, Daebak fam! This week, we’re spicing things up with a holiday theme!

Eric reviews K-Pop holiday classics: EXO’s 'Miracles in December,” IU's 'Merry Christmas in Advance ft. Thunder from MBLAQ,” and Eric Nam's 'Melt My Heart.”

He also answers YOUR questions on Discord. What is his special song-writing tip? What in the world is his favorite boba flavor? So many questions jam-packed into one episode.

Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.

Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios

Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !

#EXO #MiraclesinDecember #IU #MerryChristmas #MBLAQ #Cheongdung #EricNam #MeltMyHeart #DaebakShow #DIVEStudios
